original_text: The stones in your fields will not give you trouble. The wild animals will not attack you. The stones in your fields will not give you trouble.
korean_text: 들에 있는 돌이 너와 언약을 맺겠고 들짐승이 너와 화목하게 살 것이니라

sentences.original_text: The stones in your fields will not give you trouble.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 밭의 돌들이 너를 괴롭히지 않을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: The wild animals will not attack you.
The stones in your fields will not give you trouble.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 밭의 돌들이 너를 괴롭히지 않을 것이다.
